favorites.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
favorites.tagline: Every generation has a legend. Every journey has a first step. Every saga has a beginning.
favorites.overview: Anakin Skywalker, a young slave strong with the Force, is discovered on Tatooine. Meanwhile, the evil Sith have returned, enacting their plot for revenge against the Jedi.

favorites.title: The Incredible Hulk
favorites.tagline: You'll like him when he's angry.
favorites.overview: Scientist Bruce Banner scours the planet for an antidote to the unbridled force of rage within him: the Hulk. But when the military masterminds who dream of exploiting his powers force him back to civilization, he finds himself coming face to face with a new, deadly foe.
